amendment.description: To ensure that there is a robust program of research and development for the Coast Guard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1354 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1354 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S9783-9785; text: CR S9784) To ensure that there is a robust program of research and development for the Coast Guard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1354 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1354 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Dodd.
